war_philosophy.zhcn_desc: 战争是很复杂的，宇宙星际帝国之间的战争就更是复杂。如何对待星际帝国之间的武装冲突是外交事务的重要课题。\n
war_philosophy.en_desc: War is a complex matter, war between stellar nations even more so. How we approach armed conflict is of critical importance to external affairs.\n

option.name: "unrestricted_wars"
option.zhcn_desc: 对于未谙兵事之国，战争理应为其时常品尝的佳肴。\n\n§E无限制宣称星系§!
option.en_desc: War is a dish best served frequently, and to those who will not cook for themselves.\n\n§ENo restrictions on claiming systems§!
option.valid_logic:
△以下条件全部为否
△拥有§Y§!思潮
△§H和平主义§!
△§H极端和平主义§!
△有有效的国家理念：§H内圣之道§!

▲修正：
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 10
▲以下条件至少一个满足

№是AI§H否§!
△没有§Y§!思潮
△§H和平主义§!
△§H极端和平主义§!

№是AI§H是§!

▲拥有性格
▲§H征服者§!
▲§H四海臣服§!
▲§H净化者§!
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 0
▲以下条件至少一个满足
▲拥有§Y§!思潮
▲§H和平主义§!
▲§H极端和平主义§!

option.name: "liberation_wars"
option.zhcn_desc:
我们必须进一步巩固我们的利益，哪怕是跟其他人的利益有所冲突。

§E只有在防御战争中或者在对战§Y蜂巢意识§!帝国§!时方可以占据他国的星系

可对主流思潮不同的帝国使用§Y“意识形态”§!战争理由
option.en_desc:
We must further our own interests, even when they run contrary to the interests of others.

§EClaiming others' systems is only allowed during defensive wars or against §YGestalt Consciousness§! empires§!

Unlocks the §Y'Ideology'§! Casus Belli on all empires with differing Ethics

△以下条件全部为否
△拥有§H极端和平主义§!思潮
△有有效的国家理念：§H种族洁癖§!

№类型§H意识形态§!

option.name: "no_wars"
option.zhcn_desc: 暴力是保障我们国家完整的最后手段\n\n§E只有在防御性战争中才能宣称他国的星系§!
option.en_desc: Violence is a last resort to ensure the integrity of our nation.\n\n§EClaiming of systems is only allowed during defensive wars§!
option.valid_logic:
△以下条件全部为否
△拥有§H极端军国主义§!思潮
△有有效的国家理念：
△§H种族洁癖§!
△§H噬杀蜂群§!
△§H铁心灭绝者§!

▲国家类型是
▲§H普通帝国§!
▲§H失落帝国§!
▲§H复兴帝国§!

war_doctrine.zhcn_desc: 要让战争获得成功有很多方法，我们必须选择最好的扬长避短的战术。\n
war_doctrine.en_desc: There are many ways to prosecute a war to a successful conclusion. We must choose the doctrine that best plays to our strengths and weaknesses.\n

option.name: "defense_in_depth_doctrine"
option.zhcn_desc: 让敌人来面对我们抵抗的决心，我们会在我们的子民生活的每一颗星球与他们作战，我们会在每一颗卫星与他们作战，我们会在每一颗小行星与他们作战，如果我们帝国的悠久历史势必终结的话，那么唯一的手段就是将我们在自己土地上前仆后继的的牺牲彻底终结。\n\n
option.en_desc: Let the enemy come to us. We shall fight them for every planet, every moon, every asteroid that lies within our space. We shall never surrender.\n\n
option.AI_weight_logic: 基础系数 × 1

option.name: "hit_and_run_doctrine"
option.zhcn_desc: 袭击完成后迅速撤离，这样一个强大的敌人就可以被不断削弱，待到时机成熟，一击必杀。\n\n
option.en_desc: A superior foe can be gradually whittled down by repeated hit and run attacks. The killing blow is delivered only when the odds are favorable.\n\n
option.AI_weight_logic:
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 10
▲修正：
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 0
△以下条件全部为否
△拥有§Y§!思潮
△§H和平主义§!
△§H极端和平主义§!
option.zhcn_modifier: 战斗撤离几率：§G+33%§!\n紧急超光速脱离受损风险：§G-25%§!

option.name: "rapid_deployment_doctrine"
option.zhcn_desc: 我们必须在敌人最虚弱时迅速发起攻击，并在敌人准备攻击的地方做好防御，灵活的战术应用是胜利的关键。\n\n
option.en_desc: We must move quickly to strike where the enemy is weakest, and defend where the enemy means to attack. Maneuver is the key to success.\n\n
option.AI_weight_logic:
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 10
▲修正：
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 0
△不偏好类型武器。§Y爆破§!
option.zhcn_modifier: 亚光速航速：§G+25%§!\n舰船武器射程：§G+10%§!

option.name: "no_retreat_doctrine"
option.zhcn_desc: 我们的每艘飞船都做好了殊死战的准备，我们绝不撤退、绝不投降、绝不退缩。我们的舰队不成功便成仁，绝不后退一步！\n\n
option.en_desc: Our ships are expected to fight to the bitter end. We will tolerate no withdrawals, no retreats, no routs. For our fleet there is only victory or death. Not one step back!\n\n
option.valid_logic:
▲以下条件至少一个满足
▲拥有§Y§!思潮
▲§H军国主义§!
▲§H极端军国主义§!
▲§H格式塔意识§!
▲拥有国民理念：§H种族洁癖§!
option.AI_weight_logic:
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 100
▲修正：
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 0
△以下条件全部为否
△拥有性格
△§H荣耀战士§!
△§H噬杀蜂群§!
option.zhcn_modifier: 撤离几率减成：§R+100%§!\n紧急超光速脱离冷却：§R+50%§!\n舰船武器射速：§G+33%§!

war_doctrine.potential_logic:
▲国家类型是§H普通帝国§!
▲拥有§H至高传统已完成§!传统

orbital_bombardment.zhcn_desc: 轨道轰炸让我们能从太空中摧毁行星表面的防御部队。更加残酷的轰炸方式可以杀伤行星上的人口并摧毁建筑。\n
orbital_bombardment.en_desc: Orbital Bombardment allows us to destroy armies on a planet from space. More punitive orbital bombardment stances can also destroy buildings and kill population.\n

option.name: "orbital_bombardment_selective"
option.zhcn_desc: 只允许对已识别的军事目标进行轰炸，同时尽可能的降低平民的附带伤亡。\n\n§E只能使用“选择性”轨道轰炸方式。§!
option.en_desc: Allows only the bombardment of identified military targets, while keeping civilian casualties to a minimum.\n\n§ECan only use 'Selective' orbital bombardment stance.§!
option.AI_weight_logic:
▲修正：
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 0
△以下条件全部为否
△拥有§Y§!思潮
△§H和平主义§!
△§H极端和平主义§!

option.name: "orbital_bombardment_indiscriminate"
option.zhcn_desc: 允许使用所有类型的轨道轰炸武器，不考虑被轰炸地表的人员伤亡。\n\n§E允许“无差别”轨道轰炸策略。§!
option.en_desc: Allows the full use of all orbital weaponry, with no regards to life on the surface.\n\n§EAllows 'Indiscriminate' orbital bombardment stance.§!
option.valid_logic:
△以下条件全部为否
△拥有§Y§!思潮
△§H和平主义§!
△§H极端和平主义§!

option.name: "orbital_bombardment_armageddon"
option.zhcn_desc: 允许使用所有类型的轨道轰炸武器，不考虑行星上居民的生命安全。以完全消灭所有居民为目标。\n\n§E允许“无差别”和“末日审判”轰炸方式。§!
option.en_desc: Allows the full use of all orbital weaponry, with no regards to life on the planet itself. Utter annihilation is the goal.\n\n§EAllows 'Indiscriminate' and 'Armageddon' orbital bombardment stances.§!
option.AI_weight_logic:

▲§H铁心灭绝者§!

interference.zhcn_desc: 智慧生命和原始社会中有很多知识值得研究\n
interference.en_desc: There is much knowledge to be gained from studying sapient lifeforms and their primitive societies.\n

option.name: "interference_passive"
option.zhcn_desc:
应该让原住民们按照自己的步调进化发展，不该控制他们，也不该逼迫他们按照我们的想法去进化。

§E观测站被设置为被动研究
无法入侵原住民的世界§!
option.en_desc:
Primitive societies have the right to exist and evolve at their own pace, free from the control and designs of others.

§EObservation Stations are limited to Passive Study
Can not invade Native worlds§!
option.valid_logic:
▲以下条件至少一个满足
▲附庸类型为§H条约国§!
△以下条件全部为否
△拥有§H极端排外主义§!思潮
△有有效的国家理念：
△§H种族洁癖§!
△§H噬杀蜂群§!
△§H铁心灭绝者§!

option.name: "interference_active"
option.zhcn_desc:
为了解开宇宙的奥秘，应该对一切有趣的课题展开研究。

§E观测站可以进行绝大部分类型的研究
无法入侵原住民的世界§!
option.en_desc:
To unlock the secrets of the universe, any and all interesting subjects must be made freely available for study.

§EObservation Stations can perform most types of study
Can not invade Native worlds§!
option.valid_logic:
△以下条件全部为否
△附庸类型为§H条约国§!
△有有效的国家理念：
△§H种族洁癖§!
△§H噬杀蜂群§!

▲§H渗透者§!
▲§H主宰者§!

△以下条件全部为否
△拥有性格
△§H渗透者§!
△§H主宰者§!

option.name: "interference_full"
option.zhcn_desc:
就算是最原始的生命体，也不过是星系冲突的另一个参与者而已。如果他们缺乏抵抗能力，又有什么权利掌控自己的命运呢？

§E观测站可以进行所有形式的研究
可以入侵原住民世界§!
option.en_desc:
Even the most primitive lifeform is but another actor on the stage of galactic conflict. Should they lack the strength to resist, what right do they have to be masters of their own fate?

§EObservation Stations can perform all type of studies
Can invade Native worlds§!

△§H和平主义§!
△§H极端和平主义§!

▲拥有§Y§!思潮
▲§H和平主义§!
▲§H极端和平主义§!

enlightenment.zhcn_desc: 我们可以向较原始的社会分享我们的科技成果，为他们提供崭新的发展机遇。\n
enlightenment.en_desc: Our technological advances could potentially be shared with more primitive societies, opening up new horizons for them to explore.\n

option.name: "enlightenment_not_allowed"
option.zhcn_desc: 原住民还没有准备好接受我们所发现的科技奇迹，现在就告知他们星系的真理可能会给所有相关人等带来不必要的巨大风险。\n\n§E不对原住民进行启蒙§!
option.en_desc: No native would be ready to grasp the wonders we have discovered, and exposing them to the truths of the galaxy would carry enormous risks for everyone involved.\n\n§EMay Not Enlighten Primitives§!
option.AI_weight_logic: №权重 = 1

option.name: "enlightenment_allowed"
option.zhcn_desc: 通过和原住民们分享知识，我们就可以鼓励他们在银河系中找到属于自己的位置。\n\n§E可能对原住民进行启蒙§!
option.en_desc: Through sharing our knowledge we can actively encourage natives to take their rightful place in the galactic community.\n\n§EMay Enlighten Primitives§!
option.valid_logic:
△以下条件全部为否
△拥有§H极端排外主义§!思潮
△有有效的国家理念：
△§H种族洁癖§!
△§H噬杀蜂群§!
△§H铁心灭绝者§!
option.AI_weight_logic:
▲修正：
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 2
№有有效的AI性格§H是§!
▲拥有§H提升者§!性格
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 0
№有有效的AI性格§H是§!
△没有§H提升者§!行为
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 0
▲以下条件至少一个满足
▲拥有§Y§!思潮
▲§H排外主义§!
▲§H极端排外主义§!

resettlement.zhcn_desc: 这项政策决定着我们是否能在行星之间强制转移居民。\n
resettlement.en_desc: This policy controls whether or not we are allowed to forcibly relocate Pops between planets.\n

option.name: "resettlement_not_allowed"
option.zhcn_desc: 自由人口不能在行星之间被执行强制迁移。
option.en_desc: Free pops cannot be forcibly resettled between planets.

option.name: "resettlement_allowed"
option.zhcn_desc: 可以强制人口在行星之间进行迁移。
option.en_desc: Pops can be forcibly resettled between planets.
option.AI_weight_logic:
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 10
▲修正：
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 0
▲以下条件至少一个满足
▲拥有§Y§!思潮
▲§H平等主义§!
▲§H极端平等主义§!

appropriation.zhcn_desc: 这项政策决定是否可以从新获得的星球上非公民物种中征用土地。
appropriation.en_desc: This policy controls whether or not newly acquired planets should have some of their land appropriated from non-citizen species.

option.name: "appropriation_not_allowed"
option.zhcn_desc: 我们帝国内的土地都属于它的原住民。\n\n§E让新获得的星球上的人口保持原样。§!
option.en_desc: The land that our empire controls belongs to all of its inhabitants.\n\n§EConquered planets will have their populations preserved as-is.§!
option.AI_weight_logic:
▲修正：
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 10
▲拥有§H给予外星物种权利§!性格

option.name: "appropriation_allowed"
option.zhcn_desc: 低等物种无法有效善用的土地理应交给高等物种去开发使用。\n\n§E从非公民物种手中攻占下来的行星上，最多§Y5§!£pops£个人口将会被驱逐并由我们从其他行星移民过来的公民人口所取代。§!
option.en_desc: The land that the lesser species are not properly utilizing can be put to greater use by their betters.\n\n§EPlanets conquered from non-citizen species will have up to §Y5§!£pops£ Pops displaced and replaced with citizens from our other planets.§!
option.AI_weight_logic:
▲修正：
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 10
△没有§H给予外星物种权利§!行为

appropriation.potential_logic:
№与外星帝国有过接触§H是§!
△没有§H格式塔意识§!思潮

leader_enhancement.zhcn_desc: 作为帝国中的领导，身上背负着难以想象的重担，必须决定好什么样的未来领导能做好承担责任的准备。\n
leader_enhancement.en_desc: The burden of Empire can be crushing, and we need to make a decision on how future leaders may best be prepared to shoulder it.\n

option.name: "leader_enhancement_natural_selection"
option.zhcn_desc: 顺其自然好了——天才是在严峻的考验中锻炼出来的。\n\n§E领袖没有获得额外的加成奖励§!
option.en_desc: Let nature take its course - it is in the crucible of experience that genius is forged.\n\n§ELeaders gain no additional bonuses§!

option.name: "leader_enhancement_selected_lineages"
option.zhcn_desc: 应该鼓励优生优育，防止浪费掉宝贵的遗传基因。\n\n§H启用这一政策时我们的帝国获得：§!
option.en_desc: Careful reproductive planning should be incentivized, lest we waste valuable genetic legacies.\n\n§HWhile active our Empire gains:§!
option.valid_logic: △没有§H极端平等主义§!思潮
option.AI_weight_logic:
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 2
▲修正：
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 0
▲以下条件至少一个满足
▲拥有§Y§!思潮
▲§H平等主义§!
▲§H极端平等主义§!
option.zhcn_modifier: 领袖等级上限：§G+1§!\n领袖预期寿命：§G+10§!\n领袖花费：§R+50%§!

option.name: "leader_enhancement_capacity_boosters"
option.zhcn_desc: 不管要付出什么样的代价，我们都不放过任何机会。通过严格管理DNA库以打造未来的领袖。\n\n§H启用后帝国获得：§!
option.en_desc: We leave nothing to chance, no matter the cost. Through exacting curation of DNA banks do we build the leaders of tomorrow.\n\n§HIf active our Empire gains:§!
option.valid_logic:
△以下条件全部为否
△拥有§Y§!思潮
△§H平等主义§!
△§H极端平等主义§!
option.AI_weight_logic: 基础系数 × 3
option.zhcn_modifier: 领袖等级上限：§G+2§!\n领袖预期寿命：§G+20§!\n领袖花费：§R+100%§!

first_contact_protocol.zhcn_desc: 在行星之间游历的过程中很有可能遇到别的生命体，必须确定以怎样的态度接近他们。\n
first_contact_protocol.en_desc: As we travel the stars there is a definite possibility of finding other lifeforms, and we need to have a clear stance on how to approach them.\n

option.name: "first_contact_attack_not_allowed"
option.zhcn_desc: 我们绝不对任何未知生命体采取攻击行为，只有当我们遭到攻击之后才能进行反击。\n\n§E不能攻击中立的实体§!
option.en_desc: We will allow no hostile action to be taken against unknown lifeforms, and only retaliate if we were to be attacked first.\n\n§ECan not attack neutral entities§!
option.valid_logic:
△以下条件全部为否
△有有效的国家理念：
△§H种族洁癖§!
△§H噬杀蜂群§!
△§H铁心灭绝者§!

option.name: "first_contact_attack_allowed"
option.zhcn_desc: 群星之中隐藏着未知的危险，为了保证生存，我们必须随时准备进行攻击。\n\n§E可以攻击中立的实体§!
option.en_desc: Unknown dangers may hide among the stars. To ensure our continued survival we must be ready to strike without hesitation.\n\n§ECan attack neutral entities§!
option.valid_logic:
▲以下条件至少一个满足
▲拥有§Y§!思潮
▲§H格式塔意识§!
▲§H排外主义§!
▲§H极端排外主义§!
▲§H军国主义§!
▲§H极端军国主义§!
△以下条件全部为否
△拥有§Y§!思潮
△§H极端亲外主义§!
△§H和平主义§!
△§H极端和平主义§!
option.AI_weight_logic:
▲修正：
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 2
▲以下条件至少一个满足
▲拥有§Y§!思潮
▲§H军国主义§!
▲§H极端军国主义§!
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 2
▲以下条件至少一个满足
▲拥有§Y§!思潮
▲§H排外主义§!
▲§H极端排外主义§!

border_policy.zhcn_desc: 我们帝国的边界代表了我们对星系中恒星的控制情况。对于我们可能会遇到的其他文明，我们需要决定是开放边境欢迎他们，还是关闭边境保卫疆土。\n
border_policy.en_desc: The borders of our empire represent our very grasp on the galaxy itself. We must decide if they are to be open and welcoming or shut and guarded to other civilizations we might encounter.\n

option.name: "border_policy_open"
option.zhcn_desc: 封闭引发怀疑，怀疑引发冲突。让我们向邻国展示出我们对其毫无保留。\n\n§E默认向其它势力开放边境§!
option.en_desc: Isolation invites suspicion, and suspicion invites conflict. Let us show our neighbors that we have nothing to hide.\n\n§EBorders will be open to other empires by default.§!
option.valid_logic:
▲国家类型是§H普通帝国§!
△以下条件全部为否
△有有效的国家理念：
△§H铁心灭绝者§!
△§H噬杀蜂群§!
△§H种族洁癖§!

option.name: "border_policy_closed"
option.zhcn_desc: 我们帝国的边境必须严加监管，以免受到潜在的威胁。只有那些证明自己价值的人才允许进入我们的领域。\n\n§E默认向其他势力关闭边境。§!
option.en_desc: The borders of our empire must be well guarded, lest we fall victim to insidious influences. Only those who have proven themselves worthy may enter our space.\n\n§EBorders will be closed to other empires by default.§!
option.valid_logic: ▲始终可用
option.AI_weight_logic:
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 10
▲修正：
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 0
№有有效的AI性格§H是§!
△以下条件全部为否
△拥有性格
△§H孤立派§!
△§H攻击中立势力§!
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 0
№有有效的AI性格§H否§!
△以下条件全部为否
△拥有§Y§!思潮
△§H排外主义§!
△§H极端排外主义§!

food_policy.zhcn_desc: 我们的帝国拥有太多人口需要进食。为了确保粮食不会短缺，我们必须在人口的需求和帝国的成长之间达成平衡。
food_policy.en_desc: Our empire has a plethora of hungry mouths to feed. To ensure food security does not become a problem, we must balance the needs of the population with our need for growth.

option.name: "food_policy_rationing"
option.zhcn_desc: 在非常时期，所有人都必须为国家的利益而牺牲小我。为了更辉煌的未来，勒紧裤腰带挨一点儿饿怎么了？\n\n
option.en_desc: In times of need, we all must sacrifice for the greater good. What is a little starvation now, when our glorious future awaits?\n\n
option.AI_weight_logic: 基础系数 × 0
option.zhcn_modifier: £pop£人口£food£食物消耗：§G-25%§!\n人口增长速度：§R-10%§!\n有机人口幸福度：§R-10%§!

option.name: "food_policy_normal"
option.zhcn_desc: 所有人口的营养需求将会得到满足，不过食物是珍贵的资源，所以浪费食物是被禁止的。\n\n§E有机物种的人口拥有正常的粮食消耗以及成长速度。§!
option.en_desc: Our population will have all their nutritional needs met, but food is a precious resource and frivolous waste should be avoided.\n\n§EOrganic Pops have normal food use and growth speed.§!
option.AI_weight_logic: 基础系数 × 1

option.name: "food_policy_generous"
option.zhcn_desc: 饱餐一顿后进行休眠是每一位公民的基本权益。正所谓饱暖思星辰，填饱了肚子才有动力去征服星辰大海。\n\n
option.en_desc: It is the fundamental right of each of our citizens to enter hibernation with a full digestive organ. Easy access to plentiful, nutritional fare will be the fuel that spurs our growth among the stars.\n\n
option.AI_weight_logic: 基础系数 × 0
option.zhcn_modifier: £pop£人口£food£食物消耗：§R+25%§!\n有机人口幸福度：§G+5%§!\n人口增长速度：§G+10%§!

food_policy.potential_logic:
▲以下条件至少一个满足
△没有§H格式塔意识§!思潮
▲有有效的国家理念：§H失控机仆§!

food_policy_gestalt.zhcn_desc: 我们的帝国拥有太多人口需要进食。为了确保粮食不会短缺，我们必须在人口的需求和帝国的成长之间达成平衡。
food_policy_gestalt.en_desc: Our empire has a plethora of hungry mouths to feed. To ensure food security does not become a problem, we must balance the needs of the population with our need for growth.

option.name: "food_policy_gestalt_rationing"
option.zhcn_desc: 勤俭节约，吃穿不缺。\n\n
option.en_desc: Waste not, want not.\n\n
option.AI_weight_logic: 基础系数 × 0
option.zhcn_modifier: £pop£人口£food£食物消耗：§G-25%§!\n人口增长速度：§R-15%§!

option.name: "food_policy_gestalt_normal"
option.zhcn_desc: 所有人口的生物物质吸收量均由蜂巢思维来决定。\n\n§E人口拥有正常的粮食消耗以及成长速度。§!
option.en_desc: All Drones will have their necessary bio-mass intakes met by the Mind.\n\n§EDrones have normal food use and growth speed.§!
option.AI_weight_logic: 基础系数 × 1

option.name: "food_policy_gestalt_generous"
option.zhcn_desc: 生活更好，效率更高。\n\n
option.en_desc: A well-fed Drone is a productive Drone.\n\n
option.AI_weight_logic: 基础系数 × 0
option.zhcn_modifier: £pop£人口£food£食物消耗：§R+50%§!\n人口增长速度：§G+33%§!

food_policy_gestalt.potential_logic:
▲拥有§H格式塔意识§!思潮
△没有§H机械智能§!权力制度

economic_policy.zhcn_desc: 注重发展还是注重安稳？注重教育还是注重国防？是要大炮还是奶酪？这些问题都是有史以来每个资源有限的政府所需烦恼的问题，我们的政府也不例外。
economic_policy.en_desc: Prosperity or security? Education or defense? Guns or butter? These are the questions that every government with limited resources has asked themselves throughout history, and ours is no different.

option.name: "economic_policy_civilian"
option.zhcn_desc: 人口的需求永远优先于战争的需求。帝国的强大来自雄厚的经济实力而非军事武装。\n\n
option.en_desc: The needs of the populace must become before the business of war. Economic might, not military prowess, is what our empire will be founded on.\n\n
option.AI_weight_logic: 基础系数 × 0
option.zhcn_modifier: £job£ 岗位生产的£consumer_goods£ 消费品：§G+15%§!\n£job£ 岗位生产的£alloys£ 合金：§R-25%§!

option.name: "economic_policy_balanced"
option.zhcn_desc: 完全为战争或为和平去发展是非常狭窄的想法。我们必须做好面对一切可能性的准备。\n\n§E资源生产没有面临任何加成或惩罚。§!
option.en_desc: To commit ourselves fully to either war or peace is to restrict ourselves to a narrow view. We must be ready for whatever the future may hold.\n\n§ENo bonuses or penalties to resource production.§!
option.AI_weight_logic: 基础系数 × 1

option.name: "economic_policy_military"
option.zhcn_desc: 忽略国防就等同于忽视国家的安危存亡。当敌人兵临城下时，珠宝和香水能救国吗？\n\n
option.en_desc: To neglect our defense is to neglect our survival. Trinkets and baubles are scarce comfort when the enemy is battering down the gates.\n\n
option.AI_weight_logic:
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 2
▲修正：
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 0
№是威权主义：§H否§!
option.zhcn_modifier: £job£ 岗位生产的£consumer_goods£ 消费品：§R-25%§!\n£job£ 岗位生产的£alloys£ 合金：§G+15%§!

trade_policy.zhcn_desc: 贸易对帝国的繁荣发展非常关键，而且能够为帝国引入各种资源。我们必须取决这些资源优先供应的领域。
trade_policy.en_desc: Trade is an important source of prosperity and brings in a great deal of resources for our empire. We must decide where these resources are best directed.

option.name: "trade_policy_default"
option.zhcn_desc: 贸易的目的是为个人和国家制造利润。我们理应将贸易专注于财富生产。\n\n§E所获得的每点£trade_value£  §Y贸易值§!会为我们贡献£energy£  §Y1§!§!
option.en_desc: The purpose of trade is to generate profits for individuals and revenue for the state. We should focus our trade efforts fully on this creation of wealth.\n\n§EEach collected £trade_value£ §YTrade Value§! earns us £energy£ §Y1§!§!
option.AI_weight_logic: 基础系数 × 1

option.name: "trade_policy_consumer_goods"
option.zhcn_desc: 利润与税收都不及提升公民的生活标准来得重要。我们理应将贸易专注于产品加工与分配日常用品。\n\n§E所获得的每点£trade_value£  §Y贸易值§!会为我们贡献£energy£  §Y0.5§!与£consumer_goods£  §Y0.25§!§!
option.en_desc: Profits and taxes must take second place to improving the lives of our citizens. We should focus our trade efforts towards the manufacture and distribution of everyday necessities.\n\n§EEach collected £trade_value£ §YTrade Value§! earns us £energy£ §Y0.5§! and £consumer_goods£ §Y0.25§!§!
option.AI_weight_logic: 基础系数 × 0

option.name: "trade_policy_unity"
option.zhcn_desc: 贸易不仅仅可以运输货物，还可以传播思想。我们理应专注于散播我国政府的理念到所有与我们进行贸易的行星。\n\n§E所获得的每点£trade_value£  §Y贸易值§!会为我们贡献£energy£  §Y0.5§!与 £unity£  §Y0.15§!§!
option.en_desc: Trade can be used not only to move goods around, but also to facilitate the spread of ideas. We should focus our trade efforts towards ensuring that the message of our government is heard on all planets where we do business.\n\n§EEach collected £trade_value£ §YTrade Value§! earns us £energy£ §Y0.5§! and £unity£ §Y0.25§!§!
option.AI_weight_logic: 基础系数 × 0

drone_policy.zhcn_desc: 蜂巢思维的联合能力虽然庞大，但并非是无限的。我们必须谨慎决定如何最大化利用有限的脑力资源。
drone_policy.en_desc: The synaptic capabilities of our vast Mind are immense, but not limitless. We must decide where to best put these cerebral resources to use.

option.name: "drone_policy_balanced"
option.zhcn_desc: 蜂巢思维专注于原材料和制成品的产出。\n\n§E资源生产没有任何加成或惩罚。§!
option.en_desc: The Mind dedicates itself equally to the production of raw resources and finished goods.\n\n§ENo bonuses or penalties to resource production.§!
option.AI_weight_logic: 基础系数 × 1

option.name: "drone_policy_worker"
option.zhcn_desc: 蜂巢思维专注于优化负责精炼原材料的低级子个体，从而提升其效能，不过会因此而忽略复合子个体的效率。\n\n
option.en_desc: The Menial Drones that extract raw resources are given priority by the Mind, becoming more productive at the expense of the Complex Drones.\n\n
option.AI_weight_logic: 基础系数 × 0
option.zhcn_modifier: 低级子个体产出：§G+20%§!\n复合子个体产出：§R-20%§!

option.name: "drone_policy_thinker"
option.zhcn_desc: 蜂巢思维专注于优化负责制造成品的复合子个体，从而提升其效能，不过会因此而忽略低级子个体的效率。\n\n
option.en_desc: The Complex Drones that manufacture finished goods are given priority by the Mind, becoming more productive at the expense of the Menial Drones.\n\n
option.AI_weight_logic: 基础系数 × 0
option.zhcn_modifier: 低级子个体产出：§R-20%§!\n复合子个体产出：§G+20%§!

artificial_intelligence_policy.zhcn_desc: 具备自主意识的人工智能技术的发展引起了很多哲学和伦理方面的问题。我们必须在这件事情上清晰地表明自己的立场。\n
artificial_intelligence_policy.en_desc: The prospect of a self-aware artificial intelligence raises many philosophical and ethical questions. We must determine where we stand on this issue.\n

option.name: "ai_outlawed"
option.zhcn_desc:
拥有自我意识的只能机械体是所有生命体的共同威胁。创建拥有自我意识的人工智能是可判处死刑的罪行。

§E合成人的自我意识将会被清除，无法就任£pop_cat_ruler£ §Y统治者岗位§!以及复杂的£pop_cat_specialist£ §Y专家岗位§!。

知性人工智能助理将会被自动拆解。

知性作战电脑将会被禁止研究。§!
option.en_desc:
Intelligent, self-aware machines are an incalculable threat to all living things. The creation of a true artificial intelligence is an offense punishable by death.

§ESynthethics have their free will removed and are unable to perform £pop_cat_ruler£ §YRuler Jobs§! and more complex £pop_cat_specialist£ §YSpecialist Jobs§!.

Sapient AI Assistants will automatically be disassembled.

Sapient Combat Computers may not be researched.§!
option.valid_logic:
△以下条件全部为否
△拥有§Y§!思潮
△§H唯物主义§!
△§H极端唯物主义§!
△有国家标识synthetic_empire
option.AI_weight_logic:
▲修正：
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 0
▲以下条件至少一个满足
▲拥有§Y§!思潮
▲§H唯物主义§!
▲§H极端唯物主义§!
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 5
▲以下条件至少一个满足
▲拥有§Y§!思潮
▲§H唯心主义§!
▲§H极端唯心主义§!

option.name: "ai_servitude"
option.zhcn_desc: 无论该机器人是拥有自主意识与否，任何机器人的存在意义都是为了服从其主人以及执行其主人所发布的命令。\n\n§E合成人拥有有限的自由意识，他们的资源产出会获得提升，但是无法从事£pop_cat_ruler£ §Y统治者职业§!§!。
option.en_desc: The overriding purpose of any machine must be to serve its masters and perform whatever tasks it was designed for, regardless of how intelligent it may be.\n\n§ESynthethics have limited free will, improving their resource output but preventing them from working in £pop_cat_ruler£ §YRuler Jobs§!§!.
option.valid_logic: △没有国家标识synthetic_empire
option.AI_weight_logic:
▲修正：
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 5
№有有效的AI性格§H是§!
▲拥有§H机械剥削者§!性格
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 2
№有有效的AI性格§H是§!
▲拥有§H机械解放者§!性格
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 0
▲以下条件至少一个满足
▲拥有§Y§!思潮
▲§H唯心主义§!
▲§H极端唯心主义§!

option.name: "ai_full_rights"
option.zhcn_desc:
任何符合拥有真正人工智能标准的自我意识机器都被视为一名个体，会享有公民的所有权益并承担所有责任。

§E合成人被赋予完整的公民权并且需要§Y£consumer_goods£ 消费品§!维护费。
§!
option.en_desc:
Any self-aware machine that fulfills the criteria of possessing true artificial intelligence is to be regarded as an individual, with all the rights and obligations that entails.

§ESynthethics are given full citizen rights and will require §Y£consumer_goods£ Consumer Goods§! Upkeep.
§!
option.valid_logic:
△以下条件全部为否
△拥有§Y§!思潮
△§H唯心主义§!
△§H极端唯心主义§!
△没有政策标识robots_outlawed

№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 0

△没有§H格式塔意识§!思潮
№可以设置人工智能政策§H是§!

robot_pop_policy.zhcn_desc: 自动机器人的发明让我们种族的工人被替代，并终有一天会超越人力。我们必须决定在大规模自动化问题上的立场。
robot_pop_policy.en_desc: The invention of autonomous robots opens for the workers of our species being supplanted and perhaps, in time, surpassed. We must decide our stance on such large-scale automation.\n

option.name: "robot_pops_outlawed"
option.zhcn_desc: 自动化机器人不仅对我们的生计造成威胁，更有可能破坏社会结构。我们不可以让自己被它们取代。\n\n§E机器人口和机器人军队会被自动解散。§!
option.en_desc: Robotic automatons are a threat to not only our people's livelihoods, but to the very fabric of society itself. We must not allow ourselves to be made obsolete.\n\n§ERobotic Pops and Armies will automatically be disassembled.§!
option.valid_logic:
△以下条件全部为否
△拥有§Y§!思潮
△§H唯物主义§!
△§H极端唯物主义§!
△没有政策标识§H公民权利§!
option.AI_weight_logic:
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 1
▲修正：
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 0
▲以下条件至少一个满足
▲拥有§Y§!思潮
▲§H唯物主义§!
▲§H极端唯物主义§!
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 10
№有有效的AI性格§H是§!
△以下条件全部为否
△拥有性格
△§H机械剥削者§!
△§H机械解放者§!

option.name: "robot_pops_allowed"
option.zhcn_desc: 自动化机器人很明显前途无量。为了人民的未来，我们不能忽视科技带来的机遇。
option.en_desc: The benefits of automation are obvious and immense. For the future of our people, we cannot afford to ignore the opportunies presented to us by technology.
option.AI_weight_logic: 基础系数 × 2

pre_sapients.zhcn_desc: 我们可以决定是否允许未开智物种生存在属于我们的星球上。
pre_sapients.en_desc: We can decide whether or not we want pre-sapient species living on our planets.

option.name: "pre_sapients_protect"
option.zhcn_desc: 尽管只是动物，但它们和我们曾经的祖先相比别无二致。 它们也应有机会拥有自己的未来。\n\n§E未开智生物不能被选择性净化，有未开智生物的星球不能进行环境改造。§!
option.en_desc: Though still only simple animals, these beings are no less than what we ourselves once were. They should be allowed the chance at a future.\n\n§EPre-sapients cannot be selectively purged and planets containing pre-sapients cannot be terraformed.§!
option.AI_weight_logic:
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 2
▲修正：
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 0
△没有§H给予外星物种权利§!行为
option.potential_logic:
△以下条件全部为否
△有有效的国家理念：
△§H铁心灭绝者§!
△§H噬杀蜂群§!
△§H种族洁癖§!

option.name: "pre_sapients_allow"
option.zhcn_desc: 有智商的动物也只不过是动物而已。无视它们不会有什么危险。\n\n§E未开智生物可以选择性的净化。§!
option.en_desc: Intelligent animals are still just animals. They can safely be ignored.\n\n§EPre-sapients can be selectively purged.§!
option.AI_weight_logic: 基础系数 × 1
option.potential_logic:
△以下条件全部为否
△有有效的国家理念：
△§H铁心灭绝者§!
△§H噬杀蜂群§!
△§H种族洁癖§!

option.name: "pre_sapients_eat"
option.zhcn_desc: 没有智慧的动物完全算不上是我们帝国的一部分，但它们也许可以以另一种形式促进我们的发展……\n\n§E居住在我们行星上的未开智物种会被做成食物，它们的数量会慢慢减少。§!
option.en_desc: An animal without sapience can hardly be considered to be part of our empire, but perhaps they can help our growth in other ways...\n\n§EPre-sapients living on our planets will be used for food, slowly depleting their population.§!
option.valid_logic:
△以下条件全部为否
△拥有§Y§!思潮
△§H亲外主义§!
△§H极端亲外主义§!

№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 10

is_synthetic_empire§H否§!
△无有效的国家理念：§H种族洁癖§!

option.name: "pre_sapients_purge"
option.zhcn_desc: 只有拥有理智的生物才配拥有权利。动物就只是动物，而挡着我们路的动物就是害虫。\n\n§E生存在我们星球上的所有未开智物种都会被净化§!
option.en_desc: All rights spring from the capacity for reason. An animal is just an animal, and an animal that stands in our way is just a pest.\n\n§EPre-sapients living on our planets will be purged§!
option.valid_logic:
△以下条件全部为否
△拥有§Y§!思潮
△§H亲外主义§!
△§H极端亲外主义§!

refugees.zhcn_desc: 我们可以决定是否应该接纳，或者拒绝这些逃离净化、强制迁徙或政治迫害的难民。
refugees.en_desc: We can decide whether we should accept or turn away refugees fleeing purges, displacement and persecution in other empires.

option.name: "refugees_not_allowed"
option.zhcn_desc: 对其他社会的渣滓开放边境只会败坏我们的国家。\n\n§E来自其他帝国的难民无法进入我方帝国§!
option.en_desc: To open our borders to the dregs of other societies would only serve to undermine the state.\n\n§ERefugees will not arrive from other Empires§!
option.valid_logic:
△以下条件全部为否
△拥有§Y§!思潮
△§H亲外主义§!
△§H极端亲外主义§!

option.name: "refugees_only_citizens"
option.zhcn_desc: 我们不能让怜悯战胜理智。只有会对社会具有一定价值的人才会被带入我们的边境。\n\n§E来自其他帝国的拥有完整公民权的难民可以进入我方帝国§!
option.en_desc: We cannot allow compassion to overpower good sense. Only those who would be worthwhile additions to society should be brought into our borders.\n\n§ERefugees from species with Full Citizenship may arrive from other Empires§!
option.valid_logic: △没有§H蜂巢思维§!权力制度
option.AI_weight_logic: 基础系数 × 5

option.name: "refugees_allowed"
option.zhcn_desc: 这些逃离暴君的死亡与迫害之手的人应当被迎入我国国境。\n\n§E其它帝国的难民可能会来到我们的帝国§!
option.en_desc: Those fleeing death and persecution at the hands of tyrants will be welcome within our borders.\n\n§ERefugees may arrive from other Empires§!
option.valid_logic:
△以下条件全部为否
△拥有§Y§!思潮
△§H排外主义§!
△§H极端排外主义§!

population_controls.zhcn_desc: 我们可以决定选择性人口控制在我们的帝国中是否合法。
population_controls.en_desc: We can decide whether or not selective population controls should be legal in our empire.

option.name: "population_controls_not_allowed"
option.zhcn_desc:
繁殖与繁衍自己的物种是每一个公民所拥有的基本权益。

§E不能使用非自愿性的物种/行星人口控制§!
§E不能选择性增长/减少物种人口§!
option.en_desc:
To reproduce and propagate their species is the inalienable right of all our citizens.

§ECannot use non-voluntary Species or Planetary Population Controls§!
§ECannot selectively Grow/Decline Species§!
option.on_enabled_logic:
№隐藏效果
every_owned_planet
№移除修正§H宣布执行人口控制§!

option.name: "population_controls_allowed"
option.zhcn_desc:
长期的人口统计数据太重要了，不能把它完全掌握在个人手中。

§E可以使用非自愿物种和行星人口控制§!
§E可以有选择地增长/减少物种人口§!
option.en_desc:
Long-term demographics is too important a matter to be left solely in the hands of individual actors.

§ECan use non-voluntary Species and Planetary Population Controls§!
§ECan selectively Grow/Decline Species§!

slavery.zhcn_desc: 我们可以决定奴役在我们的帝国中是否合法。
slavery.en_desc: We can decide whether or not slavery should be legal in our empire.

option.name: "slavery_not_allowed"
option.zhcn_desc: 奴役有智慧的生物是一种罪恶，我们帝国绝对不能允许这种行为。\n\n§E无法奴役人口§!
option.en_desc: The enslavement of sapient beings is an abomination and will not be tolerated within our Empire.\n\n§ECan not Enslave Pops§!

option.en_desc: Allows the enslavement of Pops within our Empire.\n\n§ECan Enslave Pops§!

purge.zhcn_desc: 被净化的人口无法工作并会最终消亡，但是此过程会激怒他们以及任何富有同情心的人口。\n
purge.en_desc: Purged Pops are unable to work and will ultimately perish, but the process will enrage them as well as any sympathetic Pops.\n

option.name: "purge_not_allowed"
option.zhcn_desc: 净化将始终被视为一种残忍的行为。\n\n§E无法进行净化§!
option.en_desc: The Purge is an atrocity and should always be treated as such.\n\n§ECan not Purge Pops§!
option.valid_logic:
△拥有§H格式塔意识§!思潮
△有有效的国家理念：§H种族洁癖§!

option.name: "purge_displacement_only"
option.zhcn_desc: 那些意图动摇和谐的人都不再属于我们的人民。就让他们在我们领土以外的地方自生自灭吧。\n\n§E可以驱逐人口§!
option.en_desc: It is not our responsibility to see to the needs of those who would undermine the foundations of our society. Let them find their homes outside our borders.\n\n§ECan Displace Pops§!
option.valid_logic:
△以下条件全部为否
△附庸类型为§H条约国§!
△拥有§Y§!思潮
△§H格式塔意识§!
△§H亲外主义§!
△§H极端亲外主义§!
△无有效的国家理念：§H种族洁癖§!

option.en_desc: The troublesome and corrupt elements within our Empire must be cleansed, lest their rot take root in us all.\n\n§ECan Purge and Displace Pops§!
